page.title: 02HOUSING IN ERSKINE
page.content: In recent years the number of people living in Erskine has increased and so more houses have been built by the Scottish Special Housing Association. A few years ago tenants were given the opportunity to buy their houses from the SSHA or continue to rent,therefore Erskine is a mixture of private and rented houses,all with gardens. There are lots of different types of houses-flats,bungalows for old people,large family houses,and some houses for handicapped people with specially fitted equipment.The flats have door entry security systems fitted. The houses are attractively laid out with lots of green areas round about them.Other areas in Erskine have been developed by private builders,adding to the variety of houses which can be found in the area.
